title: Large Studio near lake, Loyola and Red Line -
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Large studio in Edgewater near Loyola, Lake and Red Line (Thorndale exit). This unit is one of the largest studios in Edgewater and has an updated kitchen (new flooring, countertop and cabinets) as well as an updated bathroom.   In addition, the unit has a lot of closet space and great natural light.   The building also has a covered parking garage and in-building Laundromat. It is walking distance, about 2 blocks, to the red line, lake, local cafes, parks, Whole Foods etc...    Call 773-425-7913 for a showing.
